species.name: squawkabilly
descriptions: Green-feathered flocks hold the most sway. When they’re out searching for food in the mornings and evenings, it gets very noisy.
These Pokémon prefer to live in cities. They form flocks based on the color of their feathers, and they fight over territory.

abilities.name: intimidate
abilities.effect: Lowers opponents' Attack one stage upon entering battle.

abilities.name: hustle
abilities.effect: Strengthens physical moves to inflict 1.5× damage, but decreases their accuracy to 0.8×.

abilities.name: guts
abilities.effect: Increases Attack to 1.5× with a major status ailment.
